channel.title: Linux OS download
channel.description: Hi,i'm just curious,but where do I download the original Linux OS?When I type in google for "linux os download" I instead get ubuntu or debian or linux mint,and I'm not talking about the Linux kernel either that Linus created,i'm talking about the actual OS.

item.title: Linux OS download
item.dc:creator: Joshua
item.description:
Hi as always thanks for the quick reply, and thanks for your hard work on Whonix lots of us appreciate it,been trying to find out the very first linux distro looks like the very first Linux distro was called HJ Lu interesting enough.

Read full topic

item.title: Linux OS download
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
There is no such thing.
